summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 MERCURY GRAND MARQUIS.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 13V385000 (STEERING) HAD SURPASSED A REASONABLE TIME FOR REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE MANUFACTURE STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED HE HAD NOT EXPERIENCED THE FAILURE.  ..UPDATED 02-28-14 *BF         UPDATED 3/14/2014   *JS
